content.rendered:
Metabuses product demonstrations

First, it is an example of a customer center with a metaverse. In the meantime, if an individual wants to communicate with a corporate stakeholder,

Until now, it had to go through complicated procedures such as checking contacts and e-mail addresses online.


However, now the Metabus Customer Center can simplify this unnecessary process.

Customers can enter the metaverse prepared by the company and immediately convey their difficulties.


“It can expand beyond just a customer service space to exhibitions and webinars,” he said.

It is also used as a business partnership space.

The more companies run various businesses, the more they contact related companies.

In this case, there’s a lot of business-related information to share, and it’s not about getting company information one by one

They were allowed to travel around the metaverse space and receive only the information they wanted.

Metabuses targeting companies with many product demonstrations are also drawing attention.

It is a method of conducting consultations or presenting contents by making the process of contacting products in the metaverse into a path.

출처: 카지노사이트 바카라사이트 신뢰도 최상위 업체 바카라사이트 커뮤니티 – 카지노컴퍼니
